tuv.seg: • Time off work and antenatal classes
• Am saor ón obair agus ranganna réamhbheirthe
Antenatal classes provide you with information about pregnancy, labour and delivery, and baby care
Tabharfaidh ranganna réamhbheirthe eolas duit faoi thoircheas, luí seoil agus breith, agus cúram naíonán
Many of them focus on labour and delivery alone, but others include practical advice on how to care for your baby and adjust to parenthood
Díríonn siad ar luí seoil agus ar an mbreith amháin, ach bíonn comhairle le fáil i gcuid eile acu ar conas aire a thabhairt do do naíonán agus conas dul i dtaithí ar thuismitheoireacht
Antenatal classes are provided by your hospital and you will need to telephone them to book your place
Cuireann d'ospidéal ranganna réamhbheirthe ar fáil duit agus bíonn ort glaoch a chur orthu chun d'áit a chur in áirthint
Classes are generally offered for expectant mothers alone, or for couples from about 30 weeks
Cuirtear ranganna ar fáil go ginearálta do mháithreacha atá ag súil, nó do lánúnacha ó bhíonn an bhean 30 seachtaine ag súil le leanbh
Some hospitals provide classes for couples with special needs
Cuireann roinnt ospidéal ranganna ar fáil do lánúnacha lena mbaineann riachtanais speisialta
You will need to contact your local hospital or the Health Service Executive (HSE) for details
Beidh ort dul i dteagmháil leis an ospidéal áitiúil nó Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte le haghaidh sonraí a fháil
You can read more in our document on antenatal visits
Tá tuilleadh faisnéise inár ndoiciméad, Cuairteanna réamhbheirthe
Time off work and antenatal classes
Am saor ón obair agus ranganna réamhbheirthe
Section 8 of the Maternity Protection (Amendment) Act 2004 allows pregnant women to take paid time off work to attend one set of antenatal classes (other than the last 3 classes in a set)

Faoi Alt 8 den Acht um Chosaint Mháithreachais (Leasú) 2004 is féidir le mná atá torrach am a thógáil saor ón obair le híocaíocht le freastal ar sraith amháin ranganna réamhbhreithe (ach gan an 3 rang deireanach den sraith a bheith san áireamh mar gheall gur iondúil go mbíonn siad ann tar éis don saoire mháithreachais tosnú)
For example, if you are attending a set of 8 classes and this is your first pregnancy in employment you are only entitled to be paid while attending 5 of those classes
Níl am saor ón obair le híocaíocht ar fáil duit mar sin le freastal ar ranganna réamhbhreithe gach uair a bhíonn tú torrach agus tú ag obair
You do not have the right to paid time off work to attend antenatal classes each time you are pregnant and in employment
Ach, clúdaíonn an ceart sraith amháin ranganna do do chuid toircheas ar fad
The entitlement covers one set of classes only
Tá sampla tugtha anseo:

If for any reason you are unable to attend some classes due to reasons beyond your control (that is, premature birth, illness, miscarriage or stillbirth) you can carry over your entitlement to paid time off work to attend any untaken classes to your subsequent pregnancies (except the last 3 in a set)

Má tharlaíonn sé, mar shampla, go mbíonn tú tinn agus nach féidir leat freastal ar an 5 rang ar fad an babhta seo, is féidir leat an teidlíocht atá agat a bheith íoctha le freastal ar na ranganna nár éirigh leat freastal orthu a choinneáil d’aon toircheas ina dhiaidh sin

Under the Maternity Protection (Time off for Ante–Natal Classes) Regulations 2004 expectant fathers have a once-off right to paid time off work to attend the 2 antenatal classes immediately prior to the birth

Faoi na Rialacháin um Chosaint Mháithreachais 2004 (Am Saor do Ranganna Réamhbhreithe) tá ceart aon uair ag fir a bhfuil páiste leo le teacht ar an saol am saor ón obair a thógáil agus a bheith íoctha air le freastal ar an 2 rang réamhbhreithe díreach roimh an mbreith
This entitlement does not extend to every pregnancy while the woman is in employment – it is only a once-off right
Ní féidir an teidlíocht seo a úsáid gach uair a bhíonn toircheas ann nuair atá an bhean fhostaithe - níl ann ach ceart aon uair amháin
In order to take this time off work, the employee must notify their employer in writing at least 2 weeks before classes commence, outlining the dates and times of the classes

Más mian le fostaí an t-am saor ón obair seo a thógáil, ní mór dó/dí é a chur in iúl don fhostóir i scríbhinn ar a laghad coicís roimh do na ranganna tosú, ag leagan síos na dátaí agus na hamanna do na ranganna
Employers can request written evidence of the classes (dates and times)
Is féidir le fostóirí fianaise i scríbhinn a iarraidh maidir leis na ranganna (dátaí agus amanna)
Classes are generally for a number of sessions and topics covered may include:
Ní mhaireann na ranganna ach cúpla seisiún agus ar na topaicí a chlúdaítear bíonn:
• Looking after your health during pregnancy
• Ag breathnú i ndiaidh do shláinte le linn toircheasa
• Growth and development of the baby during pregnancy
• Fás agus forbairt an naoínáin le linn toircheasa
• Options for labour and delivery
• Roghanna maidir le luí seoil agus breith
• Pain relief during labour
• Maolú ar phian le linn luí seoil
• When to go into hospital
• Cathain is fearr le dul chuig an ospidéil
• What to expect during labour
• A mbeaidh tú ag súil leis le linn luí seoil
• Breastfeeding support and advice
• Tacaíocht le leanbh a bheathú ar an gcíoch agus comhairle
• Emotional aspects of becoming a parent
• Gnéithe mothaítheacha faoi bheith i do thuismitheoir
• Physical care of your baby
• Cúram fisiciúil do leanbh
• Returning to work/childcare arrangements
• Dul ar ais ag obair/ socruithe cúram leanaí
Antenatal classes held by your local public maternity hospital are free of charge
Bionn na ranganna a chuireann d'ospidéal máithreachais áitiúil ar fáil saor in aisce
A fee is payable for private classes
Gearrtar táille ar ranganna príobháideacha
Check with your maternity hospital for more information
Chun tuilleadh eolais a fháil, cuir ceist ar d'ospidéal máithreachais
Your midwife or doctor will probably ask you if you plan to attend an antenatal class at the hospital
Tá gach seans ann go bhfiafróidh do bhean chnáimsí nó do dhochtúir díot an bhfuil sé ar intinn agat freastal a dhéanamh ar rang réamhbheirthe ag an ospidéal
These classes are generally busy, so you will need to book early
Bíonn na ranganna seo lán go minic, mar sin beidh ort iad a chur in áirthint go luath
You can find contact information for public hospitals here. Where to apply
Is féidir leat teacht ar eolas teagmhála d'ospidéil phoiblí anseo
